thread.title: Ruth Langsford appears to be the double of EastEnders' Christine, and Eamonn Holmes sees the funny side - EastEnders TV
thread.title_full: Ruth Langsford appears to be the double of EastEnders' Christine, and Eamonn Holmes sees the funny side - EastEnders News - TV - Digital Spy

author: Rachel Babbage
title: Ruth Langsford appears to be the double of EastEnders' Christine, and Eamonn Holmes sees the funny side - EastEnders TV
text: Les Coker's EastEnders character Christine is reminding fans of a certain TV presenter. It's Ruth Langsford - as her husband Eamonn Holmes was quick to point out on Twitter:Darling @RuthieeL people really seemed to have liked you on #EastEnders tonight. pic.twitter.com/A05UZ4TfKx— Eamonn Holmes (@EamonnHolmes) October 23, 2015 Ruth has taken it in good humour though, tweeting this in reply to one of her followers:I'm flattered Les has modelled Christine on me!! x https://t.co/Bx8edfAHTb— Ruth Langsford (@RuthieeL) October 23, 2015 Other viewers picked up on the similarity:Poor Ruth Gotta laugh tho @RuthieeL xx pic.twitter.com/evvluCIhQv— carley mcgurty (@carleymcgurty) October 24, 2015 @dax977 @EamonnHolmes @RuthieeL pmsl.... I knew he/she reminded me of somebody lol— Shaz (@ShazLFarbrace) October 24, 2015 Just watched last nights @bbceastenders - poor old les. And omg he did look so like @RuthieeL lol— wesley pearson (@Wezza1994Wp) October 24, 2015 Concern for Eamonn also quickly followed:@EamonnHolmes @RuthieeL Think you will be sleeping in the dog house Eamonn— phill walsh (@phill_1965) October 24, 2015 @EamonnHolmes @RuthieeL RIP Eamonns balls X— Lynn (@lynnjohnston73) October 24, 2015 @ScarSnake @EamonnHolmes @RuthieeL I'd be planning his funeral by now if it was my fella xx— Shelley (@5h3113y) October 24, 2015 And many were quick to praise Ruth for seeing the funny side:Well done to @RuthieeL for embracing Les #trouper #senseofhumour #properwoman x— Trish Taylor (@Taypot22) October 24, 2015 @RuthieeL u look stunning Ruth x— christine (@schofelover) October 24, 2015 This is the start of a big storyline for Les and Pam Coker in EastEnders, which has seen emotional scenes broadcast all week.Expect more as the story unfolds across the next few weeks. © BBCPam meets Christine EastEnders continues on Monday (October 26) at 8pm on BBC One.Digital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on EastEnders' Halloween special, Nikhil's Emmerdale return, the Nightingale family's arrival in Hollyoaks and a new romance story for Mary in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
